parts: Little streams connect the 3 Rhoa nests
Usually form a triangle, but will rarely form a line
Look for the large empty room
Go down the ledge next to the road
Search the side of road opposite
Search opposite direction of the encampment entrance
look for the torch touching the road
Follow the trail in the direction of the torch
S shape or L shape leads to exit
First floor exit will be in one of the 3 corners
Remaining floors will have the exit diagonally across from the entrance
Follow stairs that are going up
At the fork in the road with wagons, go the route with 1 wagon, not 2
The exits can often be found by travelling diagonally.

parts: , search in the corners of the map
corner of area, normally by a house
Follow the road until it ends
Follow edges of the zone and cross bridges in the corners
Typically bridges spawn in the opposite diagonal corners
Go down the ledge next to the road
Black splashes of paint on ground points to the right direction to go
Follow the dead guards by doorways
Follow the dead guards by doorways
